body.p: The Simal REST module provides a web application that exposes the Simal repository via a REST API.
body.warning: This module is in an alpha state. The API is liable to change iun response to discussion on the Simal developer mailing list .
body.note: Our documentation is quite sparse at present. Please ask for help on our mailing list and we'll be sure to expand the documentation in response to your questions. Unless you ask, we don;t know what people need to see.
